columns.label: Decadal Birthday (set filter to 1 for yes)

name: Member Birthday List
query:
SELECT
    member.name,
    member.first_name,
    member.last_name,
    member.date_of_birth,
    CASE
        WHEN member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) YEAR >= CURRENT_DATE THEN member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) YEAR
        ELSE member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) + 1 YEAR
    END,
    DATEDIFF(
    CASE
        WHEN member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) YEAR >= CURRENT_DATE THEN member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) YEAR
        ELSE member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) + 1 YEAR
    END,
    CURRENT_DATE
    ) AS daysuntilbirthday,
    (YEAR(
    CASE
        WHEN member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) YEAR >= CURRENT_DATE THEN member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) YEAR
        ELSE member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) + 1 YEAR
    END
    )
    -YEAR(member.date_of_birth)),
    (YEAR(
    CASE
        WHEN member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) YEAR >= CURRENT_DATE THEN member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) YEAR
        ELSE member.date_of_birth + INTERVAL (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) + 1 YEAR
    END
    )
    -YEAR(member.date_of_birth)) MOD 10 = 0
FROM `tabMember` member

ORDER BY daysuntilbirthday
